unsigned int  allowedItems = CIT_NONE

Adds a column to the layout.

Parameters:
[in] name The name of the column.
[in] type The content type.
[in] allowedItems The allowed items, if the content type is custom. This value is discarded if the content type is something else. See ColumnItemType for possible values.
